ModConfigMenu.CloseMenuAfterLoot.Name: Close Menu After Loot
ModConfigMenu.CloseMenuAfterLoot.Desc: Automatically close the chest menu once you've grabbed everything. Saves you a click!
ModConfigMenu.LootHotkey.Name: Loot Hotkey
ModConfigMenu.LootHotkey.Desc: Press this key to instantly grab all items from a chest.
ModConfigMenu.UseQuickStowHotkey.Name: Use Quick Stow Hotkey
ModConfigMenu.UseQuickStowHotkey.Desc: Enable this to quickly dump your inventory into chests. Your favorited items will stay safe in your inventory.
ModConfigMenu.QuickStowHotkey.Name: Quick Stow Hotkey
ModConfigMenu.QuickStowHotkey.Desc: The key(s) to press for quick stowing items from inventory to chest. Default is L. Only works when a chest menu is open. Supports key combinations (e.g., Ctrl+L) and controller buttons.
